alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 5:51PM CDT until June 27 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CALDWELL AND OUACHITA PARISHES... At 551 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rayville to Richwood, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Drew, Fondale, Bosco, Riverton, Millhaven, Cheniere, Pine Grove, Luna and Lapine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
